Text:
"self-made" covers were beautiful 
was gonna download their discography, instead this proves nice collection

Thankyou joiresway-II glad you enjoyed it!
cheers

nice work...i like the arrangement too.

vol 2 suggestions/must haves

Blitzkrieg
Disposable Heroes
Creeping Death
Four Horseman
For Whom The Bell Tolls
Crash Course In Brain Surgery

I love this collection!!  The only song i really recommend for volume 2 is "No leaf clover"  from the Metallica S&M CD....its a live song but its the only version available and a great song!!  Thanks for the collection!!!

i highly suggest to anyone who still burns cds for the car...use the audio leveling function when burning.

each Metallica album has such different production qualities...the audio goes from one extreme to another.

Hello Bubanee
Your torrents are really good as they are Original CD Rip & 320kbps.
But why do you rip at "Joint Stereo"?

Please use Stereo mode.
Just few MBs more & we can get the best quality.

Thanx BuBaNee for another Superb torrent!
Keep it goin:D
